title: Mugshots Coffeehouse
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Juice bar, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Coffee house located opposite historic site Eastern State Penitentiary. Offers fair-trade organic coffee drinks, plus teas, fresh juices, soy smoothies, desserts (including vegan), and light meals made with local produce whenever possible.
